entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Trois-Rivières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -10.2°C

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
